text:
@realDonaldTrump Resign. You're counting on race riots to deflect from your failure to deal with covid19 and 100k+ dead Americans and a shattered economy.

You've equated goddamned Nazis with those protesting them, and you wanted to shoot looters (who may be persons of color).
